label: A2B_hP9_147_g_ad-001
title: $\gamma$-AgZn ($B_{b}$) Structure
comments:
When $z_{2}=0$, $x_{3}=1/3$, $y_{3}=0$, and $z_{3}=1/2$ this structure becomes \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hP3_191_a_d-001}{the hexagonal omega ($C32$) structure}. 
 This is an alloy phase. The (1a) and (2d) sites are pure Zn, but the (6g) site is a mixture of Ag and Zn, so we designate it as ``M.'' If the system is stoichiometric then M = (Ag$_{0.75}$Zn$_{0.25}$).  The CIF for this structure labels the M site as ``Ag.'' 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_hP9_147_g_ad-001}{$\gamma$-AgZn ($B_{b}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_hP9_147_g_ad-002}{PtBi$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW label, A2B\_hP9\_147\_g\_ad. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
